name: Spooktober Visual Novel Jam!
storyline:
Hello, dear Reader! It's me, your informative narrator and guide to Northbridge! The spookiest time of the year is upon us once again, and our favorite digital mascots are up to something new! They'll be participating in the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam, the Halloween themed visual novel competition!

Meet Lime, the organized (and maybe just a tiny bit stressed) mastermind behind the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam! While Lime keeps the competitive chaos in check, her morally dubious sister, Lemon and their friends Cherry and Plum are diving headfirst into the fun (and maybe a little frustration) of creating the spookiest, kookiest visual novels ever.

But they can’t do it alone, Reader—they need your help! Will you guide Cherry’s passion, Plum’s creativity, and Lemon’s… uh, let’s call them unique ideas, toward greatness? Or will you choose violence and doom them at every opportunity? Every decision you make shapes their stories, so choose wisely—or not! After all, some of the best jams are the messiest ones. With multiple possible endings, the fate of this spooky jam is in your hands. Will it be a haunting success or a frightful flop?

Get ready to laugh, learn, and maybe even scream with Lime, Cherry, Plum, and Lemon in The Spooktober Visual Novel Jam!.. The Visual Novel!
summary: Help digital mascots Lime, Cherry, Plum and Lemon navigate their way through the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam competition. Laugh, learn, and scream(with excitement, we hope) through this visual novel and make choices to guide the girls to great success or dramatic failure!
